title: Petition to unban me from NA and EU Boards 2
body:
[LISTEN TO THIS WHILE READING]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VTsD2FjmLsw&feature=youtu.be&t=43s

So as most of you know I am currently unjustly permabanned from NA and EU boards, which has caused both boards to lose a great amount of traffic and high quality posts to the point where they're both are on the brink of being deleted. 

While it's true that OCE boards have seen major improvents ever since I started posting here, a poster of my status simply can't bless OCE with my presence when more important regions need me more than ever. 

It's time for you guys to pay your dues to me after everything I've done to improve the OCE community. I am the only one who can save the other boards and we're out of time.

Together we can make boards great again. 

\#FreeLaj2016

http://i.imgur.com/5FSG9Nb.png

replies.body:
> It's time for you guys to pay your dues to me after everything I've done to improve the OCE community. I am the only one who can save the other boards and we're out of time.

You don't even state what you did to "**improve**" OCE.

> I am the only one

Save the boards, what?

Drop the act.

> [{quoted}](name=JustTrash,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qR7qvO3M,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-13T05:30:50.806+0000)
>
> You don't even state what you did to "**improve**" OCE.

I assumed I didn't have to since it's a known fact.

> Save the boards, what?

I single handedly brought NA boards back from the dead when I first started posting there and now it needs to be done again even more so than before.

> Drop the act.

What act?
Wait who are you? not sarcastic i actually have never heard of you
That's because you live under a rock. I'd tell you to get with the times, but you seem awfully busy down there in OCE bronze 2.
sorry my solo queue rank has nothing to do with you been a complete %%%got

> [{quoted}](name=Rengorax,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qR7qvO3M,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-31T04:17:18.468+0000)
>
> Wait who are you? not sarcastic i actually have never heard of you

the lord and saviour of the oce boards

fuck off lajshit you dumb %%%%. no one here fucking likes you or wants you. just make a goddamn smurf and post on NA and EU and fuck off from here already. you're an egotistical delusional fucktard who has shit taste in music and games.

> [{quoted}](name=A steezy Scizor,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=qR7qvO3M,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-14T01:48:47.316+0000)
>
> fuck off lajshit you dumb %%%%.

That's not how you spell Lajneen and I'm most certainly not a ''dumb %%%%''.

> no one here fucking likes you or wants you.

That's your opinion (which is unimportant by the way), the vast majority here is very fond of me.

> just make a goddamn smurf and post on NA and EU and fuck off from here already. 

No, I don't feel like leveling a smurf, and even if I did they'd ban me instantly the moment that they suspect it's me.

> you're an egotistical delusional fucktard who has shit taste in music and games.

No, I'm not, as a matter of fact I regularly receive compliments for my personality and taste in music.
Maybe one day I will descend from the heavens and walk amongst my people again, but until then I will live on through the immense skill of all assassin mains.

The only cringe here is the fact that you're still in OCE Silver after almost 170 games ðŸ˜‚

http://i.imgur.com/UueExAW.png[/img]
you've been playing since season 2 and not even diamond yet http://res.cloudinary.com/urbandictionary/image/upload/a_exif,c_fit,h_200,w_200/v1395991705/gjn81wvxqsq6yzcwubok.png
Lajneen is a lad ima miss him but his true homies need him
@Riot the people have spoken, it's time to unban me.
